paragraphs: I have a wealth of opportunities at the moment, so I'm passing this on to you. Now, you didn't hear it from me, but rumor has it that the Iron Orc known as Ordooth the Corrupter has taken up residence in the complex in the northern reaches of the Valley of Scars called Exarch's Stronghold.
If you want to try for it, this bounty is yours. Good luck, my friend!
